column17: 表 12-7 技能檢定合格數(續)
column24: Table 12-7 Number of Passing the Skills Certification(Cont.)

column1: 資料來源： 勞動部勞動力發展署。
說　　明： 1.當年檢定職類數中重複辦理之職類僅以一種列計。
column8: Note： 1.The duplicate items of number of the job categories in the year will only be counted once.

column1: 2.「消防設備類群」自88年以後不再辦理檢定。
column8: 2.The skill evaluation of Fire-fighting equipment skills group is no longer to be held since 1999.
